scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/assignment/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/assignment
  set jcr:title{String} to "Assignment"
end

set ACL for AEM_ASSIGNMENT_USER_GROUP
allow jcr:read on /
deny jcr:read on /content restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /content/wknd
deny jcr:read on /content/wknd restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /content/wknd/us
deny jcr:read on /content/wknd/us restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /content/wknd/us/en
 deny jcr:read on /content/wknd/us/en restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read,jcr:write,crx:replicate on /content/wknd/us/en/magazine
end

set ACL for AEM_ASSIGNMENT_USER_GROUP
allow jcr:read on /content/wknd/ca
deny jcr:read on /content/wknd/ca restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /content/wknd/ca/en
deny jcr:read on /content/wknd/ca/en restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read,jcr:write,crx:replicate on /content/wknd/ca/en/magazine
end

set ACL for AEM_ASSIGNMENT_USER_GROUP
allow jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments
deny jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments/wknd
deny jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments/wknd restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments/wknd/us
deny jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments/wknd/us restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments/wknd/us/en
deny jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments/wknd/us/en restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read,jcr:write,crx:replicate on /content/experience-fragments/wknd/us/en/featured
end

set ACL for AEM_ASSIGNMENT_USER_GROUP
allow jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments/wknd/ca
deny jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments/wknd/ca restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments/wknd/ca/en
deny jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments/wknd/ca/en restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read,jcr:write,crx:replicate on /content/experience-fragments/wknd/ca/en/featured
end

set ACL for AEM_ASSIGNMENT_USER_GROUP
allow jcr:read on /content/cq:tags
deny jcr:read on /content/cq:tags restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /content/cq:tags/wknd-shared
deny jcr:read on /content/cq:tags/wknd-shared restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /content/cq:tags/wknd-shared/region
deny jcr:read on /content/cq:tags/wknd-shared/region restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read,jcr:write,crx:replicate on /content/cq:tags/wknd-shared/region/apac
end

set ACL for AEM_ASSIGNMENT_USER_GROUP
allow jcr:read,jcr:write,crx:replicate on /content/cq:tags/wknd-shared/activity
end

set ACL for AEM_ASSIGNMENT_USER_GROUP
allow jcr:read on /content/dam
deny jcr:read on /content/dam restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /content/dam/wknd-shared
deny jcr:read on /content/dam/wknd-shared restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en
deny jcr:read on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en/activities
deny jcr:read on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en/activities restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read,jcr:write,crx:replicate on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en/activities/cycling
end

set ACL for AEM_ASSIGNMENT_USER_GROUP
allow jcr:read on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en/magazine
deny jcr:read on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en/magazine restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read,jcr:write,crx:replicate on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en/magazine/skitouring
end

set ACL for AEM_ASSIGNMENT_USER_GROUP
deny jcr:read on /conf restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /conf/wknd-shared
deny jcr:read on /conf/wknd-shared restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /conf/wknd-shared/settings
deny jcr:read on /conf/wknd-shared/settings restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /conf/wknd-shared/settings/dam
deny jcr:read on /conf/wknd-shared/settings/dam restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /conf/wknd-shared/settings/dam/cfm
deny jcr:read on /conf/wknd-shared/settings/dam/cfm restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read on /conf/wknd-shared/settings/dam/cfm/models
deny jcr:read on /conf/wknd-shared/settings/dam/cfm/models restriction(rep:glob,/*)
allow jcr:read,jcr:write,crx:replicate on /conf/wknd-shared/settings/dam/cfm/models/article
end

set ACL for AEM_ASSIGNMENT_USER_GROUP
allow jcr:read,jcr:write,crx:replicate on /conf/wknd-shared/settings/dam/cfm/models
end
